sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box } from '@chakra-ui/react';
import PizzaCard from '../card/pizza'; // Import PizzaCard

const Main = () => {
  return (
    <Box
      
      backgroundColor="white"
      boxShadow="0px 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)" // Grey box shadow
      borderRadius="lg"
    >
      <Box display="flex" flexWrap="wrap" justifyContent="center" gap="40px">
        <PizzaCard
          imageSrc="https://www.dominos.co.in/files/items/Non-Veg_Supreme.jpg"
          pizzaName="Non Veg Supreme"
          prices={{ small: 200, medium: 300, large: 400 }}
          description="A delicious pizza topped with various non-veg items."
        />
        <PizzaCard
          imageSrc="https://www.dominos.co.in/files/items/Non-Veg_Supreme.jpg"
          pizzaName="Golden Corn Pizza"
          prices={{ small: 180, medium: 280, large: 380 }}
          description="A golden corn pizza with sweet corn and mozzarella cheese."
        />
        <PizzaCard
          imageSrc="https://www.dominos.co.in/files/items/Non-Veg_Supreme.jpg"
          pizzaName="Jalapeno & Red Paprika Pizza"
          prices={{ small: 190, medium: 290, large: 390 }}
          description="Spicy jalapenos and sweet red paprika on a cheesy base."
        />
        <PizzaCard
          imageSrc="https://www.dominos.co.in/files/items/Non-Veg_Supreme.jpg"
          pizzaName="Mexican Green Wave"
          prices={{ small: 210, medium: 310, large: 410 }}
          description="A wave of Mexican flavors with green veggies."
        />
        <PizzaCard
          imageSrc="https://www.dominos.co.in/files/items/Non-Veg_Supreme.jpg"
          pizzaName="Double Cheese Margherita Pizza"
          prices={{ small: 220, medium: 320, large: 420 }}
          description="Loaded with double cheese for the ultimate cheese lover."
        />
        <PizzaCard
          imageSrc="https://www.dominos.co.in/files/items/Non-Veg_Supreme.jpg"
          pizzaName="Italian Veg"
          prices={{ small: 230, medium: 330, large: 430 }}
          description="An Italian classic with fresh veggies and herbs."
        />
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Main;
